todos.title: Gotta learn animations now fml
todos.memo: Animations might irritate me. If only there were more game dev jobs smh.

todos.title: I figured out the issue with my animations
todos.memo: My animations look much better now, but I need to add more!

todos.title: Why are my tasks wobbly
todos.memo: Tasks are wobbling in place when tasks above it are collapsing and expanding simultaneously.

todos.title: I figured out why my tasks were wobbling
todos.memo: The speed for expanding and collapsing was not the same. I eliminated the wobble once each animation had the same speed.
